programme.title: Protest for Peace
programme.short_synopsis: On hearing anti-war protests, Alistair Cooke recalls the American Civil War drafting riot.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke considers drafting during the American Civil War, anti-war protesters, rioting and the history and nature of Al Qaeda .
